title: Scunci No-slip Grip Octopus Clip, 2 -Count
description: With scunci no-slip grip hair accessories a woman should never have a bad hair day. scunci no-slip octopus clips are your hidden secret for secure all-day hold. this clip is strong enough to hold thick hair, but petite enough to throw into your purse. large enough to hold hair in an updo but discreet enough to blend in with your style. can be used to section hair and keep it in place for curling, styling or drying. eight interlocking teeth with no-slip grip technology hold tight to prevent strays and fallout strands. one basic black and one classic tortoise in the set.

title: Cocoa Butter Formula with Vitamin E Cream Unisex by Palmer's, 13.25 Ounce
description: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula with Vitamin E Smoothes Marks & Scars 13.25 oz Value SizeCocoa Butter, enriched with Vitamin E, in a soothing emollient base. Helps smooth and blend unattractive marks and scars. Tones skin. An excellant all-over-the-body moisturizer and after tanning butter.Use immediately following exposure to the sun and wind. Ideal for deep moisturization, including overnight treatments. Widely recommended for stretch marks, during and after pregnancy. Use daily for a soft, youthful appearance.

title: 3 pcs/set Touch Me ® 5" Natural Loofah Fiber Bath Sponges -- 100% Natural Fiber. (Set of 3)
description: Loofah is a natural vegetable cleaning fiber that exfoliates dead skin and surface impurities. Effectively unclog pores - allowing skin to breathe freely, naturally. Not tested on animals. Environmental friendly. For skin with a healthy and radiant shine, use this loofah sponge to alleviate stress and tension, while stimulating blood circulation. The loofahs have been compressed for easy shipping purpose. The flat loofah will expand to round shape in water within a minute and stay in round shape.  Because loofah is a natural product, it is suggested that you rinse it thoroughly and place it in dry area after each use in order to prolong its life. Size: 5" in length

title: Biore Deep Cleansing Pore Strips, 24 Count
description: Tag team help for your blackheads: Here's a special two-pack to tackle dirt and oil that can cause blackheads on your nose - and the rest of your face. In just one use, these two different strips (for your face and nose or chin) are twice as effective as the leading pore cleanser at removing pore-clogging build-up that can lead to blackheads. And, they can even help reduce the appearance of pores with regular use.
